thread.title: 30th Birthday trip
thread.title_full: 30th Birthday trip - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ainemoore
title: 30th Birthday trip
text: Just back from a 5 night stay in The Wellington Hotel for my 30th Birthday, the trip was amazing from start to finish. It was my third time staying in this hotel and I will return someday. The girl in reception gave me a bottle of Wine upon check-in as a gift which was really lovely. We had a view of time square from our room window. Staff were very helpful and friendly, location is just perfect.
